participant_1.name: Emily Johnson
participant_1.personality: Friendly and enthusiastic, Emily loves sharing her passions with others and finding joy in simple pleasures.
participant_1.background: my favorite band is up and i got to see them in concert once. i love to play board games. for vacation i enjoy time at the beach. i'm an elementary school teacher. my parents were also teachers.

participant_2.name: Michael Thompson
participant_2.personality: Curious and creative, Michael often seeks inspiration from his diverse interests and enjoys engaging in deep conversations.
participant_2.background: i try various coffees as a hobby. i played football for a division a college. i enjoy poetry. i am a huge star wars fan.
